ComputerPlayer
public
Player
ComputerPlayer

Class of a player handled by computer. Main purpose of class is to create player and process player interaction with board.  Also, the class will handle minmax algorithm.

Functions
SimulateMove
Point& SimulateMove(
const std::vector<Point>& availableMoves
)

Simulates move of real player. Currently, it chooses point randomly. In the future it will choose it based on the MINMAX algorithm.

Parameters
availableMoves
const std::vector<Point>&

Vector of Points which are available for algorithm to choose.  Returns: Point chosen by algorithm.  See Also: HumanPlayer, Player, Point

ChooseMove
std::array<Point, 2> ChooseMove(
const std::vector<Point>& availableOuterBoardMoves,
std::vector<std::vector<Point>> availableInnerBoardMoves,
int boardSize
) override

Simulates move of real player. Currently, it chooses point randomly. In the future it will choose it based on the MINMAX algorithm.

Parameters
availableOuterBoardMoves
const std::vector<Point>&

Vector of Points which points to outer board which was not won yet.

availableInnerBoardMoves
std::vector<std::vector<Point>>

Vector of Points of board inside outer board which indicates which cell is available to place figure.

boardSize
int

size of game board Returns: Array of 2 points. First point is coordinate of outer board and the second one is the cell of board inside it.  See Also: HumanPlayer, Player, Point

ComputerPlayer
ComputerPlayer(
char symbol
)

Constructor which takes symbol which computer player will use during game.
